snippet.title: The Last Plague: Blight - Official Announcement Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description:
The Last Plague: Blight is an immersive realistic survival game developed by Original Studios. Players will need to craft, build, and forge to endure the dangers of the open world as players uncover the origins of the disease that brought the world to its knees. The Last Plague: Blight is launching into Steam Early Access for PC at a later date.

#TheLastPlagueBlight #RealmsDeep2023
